Description: Papyrus written with blank ink, demotic funerary text: recto 5 lines, verso pasted down. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Short religious text in favour of Tykos daughter of Esoeris".
Curator's comments: Published: 'An Abbreviated Demotic Book of the Dead: a Palaeographical Study of Papyrus British Museum 10072' JEA 17 (1931), 85-97, pl. 11. Translation: Mark Smith, Traversing Eternity; Texts for the Afterlife from Ptolemaic and Roman Egypt (Oxford 2009), text no. 43. Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT.
Published in S. P. Vleeming, Demotic and Greek-Demotic Mummy Labels and Other Short texts gathered from Many Publications (Studia Demotica 9; Leuven: Peeters), no. 1167.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (48748) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/48748)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured Black ink Backed: white paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: good
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir John Gardner Wilkinson
